title: Vingegaard Bullish on Beating Pogačar, Bernal Blasts Strava KoM, Movistar Backs Mas with Mega-Contract
content:
News nuggets: Vingegaard not overawed by Pogačar's 2025 rampage: 'Just because you’re the best in the spring, doesn’t mean you’re going to be the best in the Tour de France.'

Read the full article at Vingegaard Bullish on Beating Pogačar, Bernal Blasts Strava KoM, Movistar Backs Mas with Mega-Contract on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
